  • Method Details

    • act

      public void act()
      Overrides:
      act in class greenfoot.Actor

    • move

      public void move()
      Move one cell forward in the current direction.

      Initial: Dodo is somewhere in the world

      Final: If possible, Dodo has moved forward one cell

    • canMove

      public boolean canMove()
      Test if Dodo can move forward, i.e. there are no obstructions or end of world in the cell in front of her.

      Initial: Dodo is somewhere in the world

      Final: Same as initial situation

      Returns:
      boolean true if Dodo can move (thus, no obstructions ahead) false if Dodo can't move there is an obstruction or end of world ahead

    • jump

      public void jump(int distance)
      Move given number of cells forward in the current direction.

      Initial:

      Final:

      Parameters:
      int - distance: the number of steps made

    • getListOfEggsInWorld

      public List<Egg> getListOfEggsInWorld()

      List of Egg objects in the world

      Method for praciticing with lists.

    • practiceWithListsOfSurpriseEgss

      public void practiceWithListsOfSurpriseEgss()
      Randomly puts 12 surprise eggs in the world.

    • moveRandomly

      public void moveRandomly()
      Dodo moves 40 random spaces, it changes direction after each move.

    • faceDirection

      public void faceDirection(int direction)
      Faces in the direction that is given.

    • collectEggs

      public void collectEggs()
      He first goes to the nearest egg, then he picks it up, then he goes to another nearest egg and collects it. This all happens in the max moves of 40.

    • getNearestEgg

      public Egg getNearestEgg()
      Prints out which egg is the closest.

    • goToEgg

      public void goToEgg(Egg egg)
      goes to an egg.

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore()
      Updates the score of the leaderboard. It updates the moves left and what dodo's score is.
